sentences.sContent: She undertook the task of monitoring the elections.
sentences.sCn: 她承担了监督选举的任务。

sentences.sContent: He undertook to edit the text himself.

synos.tran: 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图

words.tran: 承担者；承办人；殡仪业者

trans.tranOther: to accept that you are responsible for a piece of work, and start to do it
